---
category: news
title: "Artificial networks learn to smell like the brain"
excerpt: "Using machine learning, a computer model can teach itself to smell in just a few minutes. When it does, MIT researchers have found, it builds a neural network that closely mimics the olfactory circuits that animal brains use to process odors."
